title: The Maloney No. 2 Recipe
full_text:
The Maloney No. 2 Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
bonded bourbon
1 1/2
ounces
sweet vermouth
3/4
ounce
Cynar
1/4
ounce
maraschino liqueur
Garnish:
Orange twist
Directions
Fill a mixing glass with ice and add bourbon, sweet vermouth, Cynar, and maraschino liqueur. Stir until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into an ice-filled rocks glass and garnish with an orange twist.
Whiskey
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
